com.pump.swing

Class TextHighlightSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.pump.swing.TextHighlightSheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class TextHighlightSheet
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This is a sheet that sits over a JTextComponent and highlights text.

    You can call setBackground() to control the shadow this sheet casts over the entire text component. By default the background is set to a translucent black, but to make it transparent you can call:
    sheet.setBackground(new Color(0x00ffffff,true)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
